name: Hotel Delfin
address: 5th Avenida Con Calle 6 Norte, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: In a prime location in the 5th Avenue district of Playa del Carmen, Hotel Delfin is located 300 metres from ADO International Bus Station, 600 metres from Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal and 3.3 km from Church of Guadalupe. Each accommodation at the 2-star hotel has city views and free WiFi. The property is 800 metres from the city centre and 600 metres from Playacar Beach. All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a hairdryer, all units at Hotel Delfin have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms will provide you with a terrace. At the accommodation every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Xel Ha is 47 km from Hotel Delfin, while Kantenah Bay is 33 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 34 km from the hotel.

name: Ocean Front El Faro Reef 304
address: 1a. Av. Nte. calle 10 Norte C. 10 y Z. Federal, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Situated 700 metres from the centre of Playa del Carmen, 700 metres from Playacar Beach, Ocean Front El Faro Reef 304 features air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace, an infinity pool and a fitness centre. Complimentary WiFi is provided. Each unit comes with a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a well-fitted kitchen, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also available, as well as a coffee machine. Guests can also relax in the garden. ADO International Bus Station is 600 metres from the aparthotel, while Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal is 700 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 35 km from Ocean Front El Faro Reef 304.

name: Winday Hotel - Cerca 5a Avenida
address: Ave Cmt, esq. Av 25 Colonia Zazil Ha, 77720 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring 4-star accommodation, WinDay Hotel is situated in Playa del Carmen, 2.3 km from Playacar Beach and 2.7 km from ADO International Bus Station. Featuring a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is 800 metres from Playa del Carmen Beach, and within 1 km of the city centre. At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a desk and a flat-screen TV. The rooms include a safety deposit box, while some rooms are fitted with a balcony and others also feature city views. At WinDay Hotel each room comes with bed linen and towels. Speaking English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock. Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal is 3.3 km from the accommodation, while Church of Guadalupe is less than 1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 36 km from WinDay Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Pueblito Escondido Luxury Condo Hotel
address: Av. 38 Norte Col. Centro, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Rooms Make yourself comfortable in this air-conditioned apartment, featuring a kitchen with a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and an oven. There's a private balcony. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and a flat-screen television is provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include a separate sitting area and a microwave. Amenities Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace. Business}, Other Amenities Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at this apartment in Playa del Carmen (Downtown Playa del Carmen), you'll be a 5-minute walk from Playa del Carmen Main Beach and 11 minutes by foot from Quinta Avenida. This apartment is 6.9 mi (11.1 km) from Xcaret Eco Theme Park and 0.1 mi (0.1 km) from Mamitas Beach. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: Deposit: USD 250 per stay We have included all charges provided to us by the property.
